Title: Surrender
Writer: Diana Gabaldon (based on the series of books written by), Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Anne Kenney (written for television by)
Actors: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Tobias Menzies, Laura Donnelly
Plot: Hiding in an isolated cave, Jamie leads a lonely life until Lallybroch is threatened by redcoats pursuing the elusive Jacobite traitor known as "Red Jamie." Back in Boston, Claire and Frank...
